name:
Leadership &
Management
desc:
With over a decade of experience in project management, team leadership, and business management in the roles of engineer, manager, and consultant I am extremely competent in leading and managing teams.

I am versatile in my approach with others to accommodate for personality types, and I am effective and comfortable in all communication mediums (face-to-face, virtual, telephonic, and written). I hold myself and any team I lead to a high standard of integrity and accountability, whist encouraging empathy, humility, and resilience. I excel at establishing a positive and vision-orientated workplace culture, and have a great deal of experience in project management, resource delegation, and generally managing people.

name:
Process
Engineering
desc:
I am tertiary qualified in Chemical Engineering with substantial experience in the mineral processing industry and within a major hazard facility environment.

I have worked at several zinc and copper refineries, as well as consulted locally and abroad on metal and mineral processing projects. Within these engineering roles I have worked within process development, plant maintenance and troubleshooting, health and safety, and environmental management; ultimately providing technical advice to senior management for a range of affairs.

name:
Training &
Coaching
desc:
I hold a Cert IV in Training and Assessment and have trained, lectured, and coached over 1,000 individuals in engineering, management, and computer subjects.

As an engineer, and for over a year, I hosted four fortnightly 1 hour technical training sessions for plant operators to better understand the science behind their daily job. Within my later role of manager I trained and coached a geographically disperse team of engineers in sales, company policies, and safety; using quarterly group meetings, monthly video conferences, and fortnightly one-on-one, on-the-job sessions for days at a time.

As a business consultant I coached small and medium sized business owners in all-things-business, including process improvement, workplace culture direction, product and service development, and people management (staff and customers). I am also regularly writing programming tutorials and contributing to the overall software development community.

quals.name: üéì Cert. IV in Training and Assessment

name:
Startups &
Entrepreneurship
desc:
Over the past decade, I have founded and co-founded 4 tech-startups.

Beginning with spending 6 months writing a process engineering application written in C# in 2012, I learned that customers need to be involved at every stage, but most importantly BEFORE you start to validate your idea. In 2014 I began designing 3D printed houses for builders to present to customers during the design phase; but unfortunately the technology simply couldn't meet expectations, so I managed to successfully 'fail fast'.

More recently, in 2018, I developed a recruitment platform which aimed to combine the profiles of LinkedIn and the roles of Seek, skip resumes and cover letters, and jump straight to face-to-face interviews. The project was shelved after being convinced by someone 'in-the-know' it was already in the works by Microsoft and Seek... I am still waiting for that to come true. Finally, in 2019 I co-founded a medication platform for pharmacies to share medication availability and prices to prescribing doctors.
